name: SUINTERP
description: Interpolate traces using automatic event picking

parameter_descriptions.ninterp: Number of traces to output between each pair of input traces (default=1)
parameter_descriptions.freq1: Starting corner frequency of unaliased range (default=4.)
parameter_descriptions.freq2: Ending corner frequency of unaliased range (default=20.)
parameter_descriptions.deriv: =1 means take vertical derivative on pick section (default=0)
parameter_descriptions.linear: =0 means use 8 point sinc temporal interpolation, =1 means use linear (default=0)
parameter_descriptions.lent: Number of time samples to smooth for dip estimate (default=5)
parameter_descriptions.lenx: Number of traces to smooth for dip estimate (default=1)
parameter_descriptions.lagc: Number of ms agc for dip estimate (default=400)
parameter_descriptions.xopt: 0=compute spatial derivative via FFT, 1=compute via differences (default=0)
parameter_descriptions.tmpdir: Directory path prefix for storing temporary files
